definition: to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. a dog who catches mice/to be meddlesome (idiom)
a blind cat finds a dead mouse (idiom)/blind luck
pinyin: xia1 mao1 peng4 shang4 si3 hao4 zi5

definition: the cat weeps for the dead mouse (idiom); hypocritical pretence of condolence/crocodile tears

sentences.english: You’re building a 12)rat ship here, a vessel for sea-going snitches.
sentences.chinese: 你们在营造一艘耗子船，一艘告密者的大船。

sentences.english: Watch sb. as a cat watches a mouse.
sentences.chinese: 象猫盯耗子般地盯着某人。

sentences.english: Rattled by the rats foot only, year to year.
sentences.chinese: 被耗子的脚拨来拨去的，年复一年。

sentences.english: People would have laughed at me… a cellar rat selling real estate.
sentences.chinese: 大伙儿会笑话我的，一只住地下室的耗子卖房地产。

sentences.english: B lion at home, a mouse abroad.
sentences.chinese: 在家是兽王，出门是耗子。

sentences.english: We scattered the rat poison around the cellar floor.
sentences.chinese: 我们在地窖里到处撒下了耗子药。

sentences.english: Garfield: Show me a good mouser , and I'll show you a cat with bad breath.
sentences.chinese: 给我一只抓耗子的猫，我就让你见识一下他的口臭。

sentences.english: And the people of Dor lived side by side with their rats.
sentences.chinese: 多尔国的人们和耗子们和平共处。

sentences.english: The mouse looked at her rather inquisitively .
sentences.chinese: 那只耗子用疑问的眼光看看她。

sentences.english: You mean she was crying crocodile tears?
sentences.chinese: 你是说她只是猫哭耗子假慈悲？

sentences.english: Noboby could, not with a mousy little person like Melanie.
sentences.chinese: 没有人会爱上象梅拉妮那样的小耗子模样。

sentences.english: The mouse ran nimbly up the horse's leg .
sentences.chinese: 那耗子灵活地顺着马腿爬上去。

sentences.english: At night they stayed in a temple. The evil spirit took Tang Priest to her Bottomless Cave using an evil wind.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，耗子精用妖风把唐僧擒到住处无底洞。

sentences.english: Little cat will catch some mice for that.
A mouse darted out of the closet and ran across the room.
sentences.chinese: 一只耗子从壁橱窜了出来并跑过房间。

sentences.english: Girl, you're crazier than a mouse in moonshine.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘，你简直比见了月光的耗子还吓人。

definition: tortoise/cuckold/(old) male owner of a brothel/pimp
